summary: Xiaomi, founded in 2010, is a consumer electronics company focusing on smartphones, smart hardware, and IoT platforms. With a mission to create affordable, innovative products globally, Xiaomi has rapidly grown, surpassing billion-yuan revenue within seven years. Emphasizing technology, cost-effectiveness, and product coolness, Xiaomi's future strategies include re-entrepreneurship, internet manufacturing, and steady progress. Positioned as a beacon of innovation, Xiaomi aims to lead in smart living and manufacturing, shaping the future lifestyle and global market impact.
